metadata.verbalized_tbox: Ancestor is a class in this ontology. Domain Entity is a class in this ontology. Female is a type of Sex. Female is disjoint with Male. Male is a type of Sex. Instances of Man can have Is Brother Of and Is Uncle Of relationships. Marriage is a type of Domain Entity. Instances of Marriage can have Has Male Partner, Has Partner and Has Female Partner relationships. Person is a type of Domain Entity. Person is disjoint with Sex. Sex is a type of Domain Entity. Instances of Woman can have Is Sister Of relationships. Has Ancestor is a relationship property. This property is a subproperty of Has Relation. Has Parent is a subproperty of this property. This property is transitive (it can form chains of relationships). It is the inverse of the Is Ancestor Of property. Has Brother is a relationship property. It is the inverse of the Is Brother Of property. Has Child is a relationship property. Has Daughter and Has Son are subproperties of this property. It is the inverse of the Is Child Of property. Has Daughter is a relationship property. This property is a subproperty of Has Child. It is the inverse of the Is Daughter Of property. Has Father is a relationship property. This property is a subproperty of Has Parent. This property is functional (each entity can have at most one value). It is the inverse of the Is Father Of property. This property connects Person to Man. Has Female Partner is a relationship property. This property is a subproperty of Has Partner. It is the inverse of the Is Female Partner In property. This property connects Marriage to Woman. Has Husband is a relationship property. This property is a subproperty of Has Spouse. This property can be inferred from the chain of relationships: Is Female Partner In followed by Has Male Partner. It is the inverse of the Is Husband Of property. Has Male Partner is a relationship property. This property is a subproperty of Has Partner. It is the inverse of the Is Male Partner In property. This property connects Marriage to Man. Has Mother is a relationship property. This property is a subproperty of Has Parent. This property is functional (each entity can have at most one value). It is the inverse of the Is Mother Of property. This property connects Person to Woman. Has Parent is a relationship property. This property is a subproperty of Has Ancestor. Has Father and Has Mother are subproperties of this property. It is the inverse of the Is Parent Of property. This property is equivalent to Is Child Of. This property connects Person to Person. Has Partner is a relationship property. Has Female Partner and Has Male Partner are subproperties of this property. It is the inverse of the Is Partner In property. This property connects Marriage to Person. Has Relation is a relationship property. Has Ancestor and Is Bloodrelation Of are subproperties of this property. This property is symmetric (if A relates to B, then B relates to A). This property connects Person to Person. Has Sex is a relationship property. This property is functional (each entity can have at most one value). This property connects Person to Sex. Has Sister is a relationship property. It is the inverse of the Is Sister Of property. Has Son is a relationship property. This property is a subproperty of Has Child. It is the inverse of the Is Son Of property. Has Spouse is a relationship property. Has Husband and Has Wife are subproperties of this property. It is the inverse of the Is Spouse Of property. Has Wife is a relationship property. This property is a subproperty of Has Spouse. This property can be inferred from the chain of relationships: Is Male Partner In followed by Has Female Partner. It is the inverse of the Is Wife Of property. Is Ancestor Of is a relationship property. Is Bloodrelation Of is a relationship property. This property is a subproperty of Has Relation. Is Sibling Of is a subproperty of this property. Is Brother Of is a relationship property. This property is a subproperty of Is Sibling Of. This property connects Man to Person. Is Child Of is a relationship property. Is Daughter Of and Is Son Of are subproperties of this property. Is Daughter Of is a relationship property. This property is a subproperty of Is Child Of. Is Father Of is a relationship property. Is Female Partner In is a relationship property. Is Husband Of is a relationship property. Is Male Partner In is a relationship property. Is Mother Of is a relationship property. Is Parent Of is a relationship property. Is Partner In is a relationship property. Is Sibling Of is a relationship property. This property is a subproperty of Is Bloodrelation Of. Is Sister Of and Is Brother Of are subproperties of this property. This property can be inferred from the chain of relationships: Has Parent followed by Is Parent Of. This property is symmetric (if A relates to B, then B relates to A). This property is transitive (it can form chains of relationships). Is Sister Of is a relationship property. This property is a subproperty of Is Sibling Of. This property connects Woman to Person. Is Son Of is a relationship property. This property is a subproperty of Is Child Of.
